result.execSummary:
The defendant Jennifer S Peirce was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

with huber if defendant qualifies under jail criteria.

Current: 106 Purdy Ave, Marshfield, WI 54449 United States  (Effective: 09-15-2015)
Prior: 1500 Strongs Ave, c/o Portage Co Jail, Stevens Point, WI 54481 United States

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:55 am 
INCLUDES 14CM2059, 15CM623, AND 15CM744. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person, in custody with Atty James Kuerzewski.  

PLEA HEARING IN 15CM623 AND 15CM744. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 
State moves to: 
In 15CM744: Ct. 2 (DC/Repeater/DA)>>D&RI. 
                     : Ct. 3 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 
PLEA: 
In 15CM623: Ct. 1 (DC/DA/Repeater)>>GUILTY. 
In 15CM744: Ct. 1 (Battery/Repeater/DA)>>GUILTY. 
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

SENTENCING IN 15CM623 AND 15CM744 AND SENTENCING AFTER REVOCATION IN 14CM2059. 
Atty Kurszewski makes statement. Def makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS: 
In 14CM2059: Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>6 months MCJ with 55 days credit. 
                       : Ct. 3 (Misd. BJ)>>6 months MCJ with 55 days credit. 
In 15CM623: Ct. 1 (DC/DA/Repeater)>>6 months MCJ with NO days credit and payment of court costs including 1 DA surcharge. 
In 15CM744: Ct. 1 (Battery/Repeater/DA)>>6 months MCJ with 55 days credit and payment of court costs including 1 DA surcharge. 
COURT ORDERS all sentences to run concurrent to each other and concurrent to any other sentence def is serving. 
COURT ORDERS any outstanding costs in 14CM2059 converted to civil judgment. 
COURT notes intent that these sentences be served in Portage County where def is already serving a sentence. 
COURT orders jail with huber if def qualifies under jail criteria. 
Adj: 10:11 am
